source.sqlReaderQuery: select TableName,WatermarkValue from watermarktable where TableName = '[dbo].[Orders_Src]'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT * FROM [dbo].[Orders_Src] where OrderDate >'@{activity('Lookup1').output.firstRow.WatermarkValue}' AND
OrderDate <= '@{activity('Lookup2').output.firstRow.mdate}'
